Question: How to get the first key of a hashmap?: :I have the following HashMap<String, Double> map = new HashMap<String, Double>();How can i get the first key without iterating over it like this:Iterator it = map.entrySet().iterator();while (it.hasNext()) {    Map.Entry pair = (Map.Entry)it.next();    System.out.println(pair.getKey() + " = " + pair.getValue());    it.remove(); }Thanks
Please using this api: Iterator.next.
